rules.name: Yup_alerte_typo
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 12) OR (3 AND 4 AND 12) OR (5 AND 6 AND 12) OR (7 AND 8 AND 12) OR (9 AND 10 AND 11 AND 12)
rules.label: Yup, alerte typo

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Etat produit sur l'objet Equipement du Sinistre
dynamicChoiceSets.name: EtatProduit_EquipementDuSinistre

formulas.name: ChosenAddress
formulas.expression: IF ( AND ( {!Changer_mes_coordonnes} == true, LEN({!NewAddressExpedition.street}) > 0 ) , LEFT({!NewAddressExpedition.street},100) + " " + LEFT({!NewAddressExpedition.postalCode},10) + " " + LEFT({!NewAddressExpedition.city},40) + " " + LEFT({!NewAddressExpedition.province},45)+ " " + LEFT({!NewAddressExpedition.country},60), {!CurrentAddress} )

Flow.label: Validation Sinistre

fields.name: test
fields.fieldText: ﻿Les coordonnées qui seront utilisées pour le sinistre :
